articles.title: Pfizer COVID-19 vaccine reduces transmission after one dose - UK study - Reuters
articles.description: A single dose of Pfizer and BioNtech's COVID-19 vaccine cuts the number of asymptomatic infections and could significantly reduce the risk of transmission of the virus, results of a UK study found on Friday.

articles.description: Costco is upping its minimum pay to $16 an hour because "paying employees good wages makes sense," W. Craig Jelinek told the Senate Budget Committee.
